    • Method Detail

      • getAgencyCycleProcess

        AgencyCycleProcess getAgencyCycleProcess()
        Returns:
        The Agency Bill Workflow for the Cycle that this Statement Invoice is on

      • isPromised

        boolean isPromised()
        Returns:
        True if the the statement has at least one executed promise, even if it has since been paid.

      • getPromiseDueDate

        java.util.Date getPromiseDueDate()
        return the promise due date for this statement according the the agency bill plan
        Returns:
        promise due date

      • getNetAmountDue

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountDue()
        Returns:
        The amount that is left to be paid on this Statement. (i.e., the difference between the net amount that needs to paid and the net amount that has already been paid or written off.)

      • isExactlyPaidIncludingSnapshots

        boolean isExactlyPaidIncludingSnapshots()
        Returns:
        true if all the items on this statement invoice (including any snapshot items) have been exactly paid

      • getNetAmountPaidIncludingPayable

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountPaidIncludingPayable()
        Returns:
        NetAmountPaid counting Commission Payable as Paid Commission.

      • getNetAmountSettled

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountSettled()
        Returns:
        NetAmount Paid and WrittenOff and Payable.

      • getNetAmountSettledIncludingPromises

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountSettledIncludingPromises()
        Returns:
        NetAmount Promised And Paid and WrittenOff and Payable.

      • getNetAmountUnsettled

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountUnsettled()
        Returns:
        The sum of the NetAmountUnsettled (Amount - NetPaid - NetWrittenOff) across all invoice items on the statement

      • getNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPromises

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPromises()
        Returns:
        The sum of the NetAmountUnsettledIncludingPromises (Amount - NetPaidAndPromised - NetWrittenOff) across all invoice items on the statement
